summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE # 02I002000 SUBJECT: ABS.   CONSUMER CALLED THE DEALER AND MADE AN APPOINTMENT.  WHEN THE CONSUMER GOT TO THE DEALER, THERE WERE NO PARTS AVAILABLE.
